The final dimensions of the part will be 2 units by 3 units by 4 units. This operation results in the creation of a new solid body. *Step 6: Document the part* Document the part with the following description: - Shape: A three-dimensional rectangular prism with a flat top and bottom. The sides are parallel and the edges are straight. The dimensions of the prism are 2 units by 3 units by 4 units. - Length: 2 units - Width: 3 units - Height: 4 units</description>
